definitions.definition: For fear that; that not; in order to prevent something from happening; in case.
examples: He won't go outside, lest he be eaten by those ravenous eagles.
I brought my notes lest faulty memory lead me astray.

definitions.definition: that ( without the negative particle; introduces the reason for an emotion. )
examples: There was danger/alarm lest the plan become known.
I am afraid lest I revealed too much.
labels: after certain expressions denoting fear or apprehension
definitions.label_groups: after certain expressions denoting fear or apprehension

main_definition: For fear that; that not; in order to prevent something from happening; in case.
secondary_definitions: ( after certain expressions denoting fear or apprehension ) that ( without the negative particle; introduces the reason for an emotion. )
